name: Purchase Vendor Report
query:
SELECT DISTINCT
    DISTINCT pi.supplier as Supplier,
    pi.cost_center as CostCentre,
    po.telecom_circle as TelecomCircle,
    po.status as POStatus,
    po.transaction_date as PODate,
    po.schedule_date as PORequiredBy,
    po.name as PurchaseOrderNumber,
    po.total_qty as POQty,
    po.total as POAmount,
    pr.name as GRNNo,
    pr.posting_date as GRNDate,
    pr.total_qty as ReceivedQty,
    (po.total_qty - pr.total_qty) as ShortageQty,
    pr.total as ReceivedAmount,
    (po.total - pr.total) as PendingAmt,
    pr.status as GRNStatus,
    pi.name as PurchaseInvoiceNumber,
    pi.posting_date as PurchaseInvoiceERPDate,
    pi.bill_no as SupplierNo,
    pi.bill_date as SupplierInvDate,
    pi.total_qty as InvBilledQty,
    (pi.total_qty - po.total_qty) as PendingQtytoBill,
    pi.grand_total as GrandTotal,
    pi.status as PIStatus,
    pi.tax_withholding_category as TDSCategory,
    pit.tax_amount as TaxAmount,
    pi.due_date as DueDate,
    pi.status as PaymentStatus,
    pi.company as Company,
    pe.reference_no as ReferenceNo,
    per.parent as PaymentEntry,
    pe.reference_date as PaymentDate,
    pe.paid_amount as PaymentAmount
FROM
    `tabPurchase Order` po
JOIN  
    `tabPurchase Invoice Item` pii
    ON pii.purchase_order=po.name
LEFT JOIN 
    `tabPurchase Invoice` pi
    ON pi.name = pii.parent
LEFT JOIN 
    `tabPurchase Taxes and Charges` pit
    ON pi.name = pit.parent
JOIN  
    `tabPurchase Receipt Item` pri
    ON pri.purchase_order=po.name
LEFT JOIN 
    `tabPurchase Receipt` pr
    ON pr.name = pri.parent
LEFT JOIN
    `tabPayment Entry Reference` per
    ON per.reference_name = pi.name
LEFT JOIN 
    `tabPayment Entry` pe
    ON pe.name = per.parent
GROUP  BY
    po.name
